comment.author: 13935339@N05
comment._content: 21 March 1944: P-47D serial 42-8394 (coded QI-U) of the 361st Fighter Squadron, 356th FG was normally assigned to CAPT Evert Korhorn. It was in the hands of CAPT Richard C. Nystrom when it made this belly landing at Martlesham Heath after his engine quit; Nystrom was injured in the crash.
